document_data.caption: A map showing Mount Alue in north Halruaa.
document_data.name: Mount Alue
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Alue''' was a dominant peak found in the [[Nathaghal Mountains]] in [[Halruaa]].
document_data.Geography: Mount Alue was situated near the center of the Nathaghal Mountains. It's snow-capped peak was the source of the [[River Aluar]].
